products.name: Smartphone X1
products.description: The latest Smartphone X1 with a 6.5-inch display, 128GB storage, and a powerful camera setup. Perfect for photography and gaming.

products.name: Wireless Earbuds
products.description: Experience high-quality sound with these wireless earbuds. Perfect for commuting or working out, with noise cancellation and long battery life.

products.name: Gaming Laptop Pro
products.description: Powerful gaming laptop with Intel Core i7 processor, 16GB RAM, and a GTX 1660Ti graphics card. Ideal for gaming and intensive work tasks.

products.name: Bluetooth Speaker
products.description: Compact, portable Bluetooth speaker with high-quality sound and deep bass. Perfect for parties or outdoor activities.

products.name: Smartwatch Pro
products.description: Keep track of your fitness goals with the Smartwatch Pro. Features heart rate monitoring, step tracking, and sleep analysis.

products.name: Electric Kettle
products.description: Fast-boiling electric kettle with auto shut-off function and sleek stainless steel design. Ideal for tea or coffee lovers.

products.name: Home Theater System
products.description: Surround yourself with premium sound quality with this home theater system. 5.1 surround sound for the ultimate movie experience.

products.name: Digital Camera 4K
products.description: Capture stunning 4K videos and high-resolution images with the Digital Camera 4K. Features built-in stabilization and WiFi.

products.name: Cordless Vacuum Cleaner
products.description: Powerful and lightweight cordless vacuum cleaner for all your home cleaning needs. Features a long-lasting battery and easy-to-use design.

products.name: 4K Smart TV
products.description: Enjoy your favorite movies and shows in stunning 4K resolution with this Smart TV. Features built-in streaming apps and voice control.

products.name: Noise Cancelling Headphones
products.description: Immerse yourself in music without distractions with these noise-canceling headphones. Ideal for travelers and music enthusiasts.

products.name: Portable Power Bank
products.description: Never run out of battery with this portable power bank. 10000mAh capacity and fast charging support for your devices.

products.name: Smart Thermostat
products.description: Save energy and control your home temperature with the Smart Thermostat. Features WiFi connectivity and smart home integration.

products.name: Laptop Stand Adjustable
products.description: Ergonomic and adjustable laptop stand that helps improve posture while working. Compact and portable design for any workspace.

products.name: VR Headset
products.description: Experience virtual reality like never before with this high-quality VR headset. Compatible with gaming consoles and smartphones.

products.name: Action Camera HD
products.description: Capture all your adventures with the Action Camera HD. Features waterproof capabilities, HD recording, and wide-angle lens.

products.name: LED Desk Lamp
products.description: Brighten your workspace with this energy-efficient LED desk lamp. Adjustable brightness levels and a modern design.

products.name: Electric Shaver
products.description: Get a close shave with this electric shaver. Features a waterproof design and multiple trimming attachments.

products.name: Smart Door Lock
products.description: Secure your home with this smart door lock. Features keyless entry, remote access, and auto-locking functionality.

products.name: Mini Fridge
products.description: Compact mini fridge with a sleek design, perfect for small spaces, offices, or dorm rooms.
